item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in and around New Haven.

3/12/2012 Location is:

Side Street

Side Street is a good neighborhood place, with an (often humorous) bar-food menu, over 70 beers and 19 taps.

If you are only a "Maybe" for Happy Hour Type Events, please put this in your RSVP Comment.

Your contact/host is Devorah.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: We're usually one of the largest groups at the bar on a Monday. Look for / Call the "Contact/host" from event description (devorah in this case), cell phone number listed below if you get lost.
item.name: Happy Hour - Side Street Grill
